The Portal series has been amazing puzzle games Portal 1 may have had a nice cake but Portal 2 put the cherry on top and all the extras to go with that cake.
What I'm trying to say is Portal 2 is the best sequel to Portal 1 Valve could have ever made not only does it go more into the origins of Aperture and into the backstory of Glados but still keeps the puzzles coming

This game is amazing! I recommend it to everyone, even those who have not yet played the first game (Though i highly recommend it, theres a lot of references.) I love the multiplayer where you get to work together with your friends to solve puzzles, and the singleplayer is even better! My favorite part is the underground. Seeing how Aperture used to be is truly amazing. Good game, great story. :)

I TOTALLY LOVE THIS GAME!!!  I wish it were longer!  I wish there was a Portal 3!  I love being terrified by the heights!  My palms are sweating profusely most of the game!  I am afraid of heights!  You really have to think your way through some very enjoyable and scary puzzles!  Way FUN!!!  MORE!  MORE!  MORE!  MORE!  MORE!  MORE!  MORE!  MORE!  MORE!  MORE!  MORE!  MORE!  MORE!  MORE!  MORE!  MORE!  MORE!  MORE!  MORE!

On sale for $2 it's a steal. Base price of $20? Still worth it. The story is extremely fun, but where the game really shines is co-op. The base game co-op missions can be a bit tricky at times, but when you run out of them you have the amazing work of the community to fall back on in the workshop.

Bom, eu comprei o jogo na promoção de 90% de desconto, estava uns 3 reais e alguma coisa... comprei com o pensamento de "Vou comprar só pra coleção na biblioteca", resolvi baixar, pois vi que o jogo é muito aclamado, e meu amiiiiiiiiiiigooooo, com certeza está na minha lista  de melhores jogos que já joguei desde que me conheço por gamer.
